MR No. 1583 - Ministers Should Cooperate and Preach Practical Truths

     (Written September 10, 1899, from "Sunnyside," Cooranbong, N.S.W., to "Dear Brother.") 


     I am sorry to learn from your letter that some things which are not pure provender are being given to the church of God as food. No one can feed the church of God aright unless he studies the pure, sanctifying principles of the truth. Non-essential subjects are not to occupy our minds. Our conversation should be pure, uplifting, ennobling.
